title: JUST DO IT !
body: Delete fizz plz rito JUST DO IT

replies.body:
Fizz is pretty annoying to vs, especially with his troll pole and the fact that he is so versatile that he can build AD/AP/tank and still dominate lane. Generally melee champs are weak vs ranged, but fizz hits his powerspikes early and will usually decimate and immobile ranged target. If Riot removed every champ that had a "QQ RITO REMOVE X!" thread about them, we would only be left with Ashe.

* Champions that are able to match his burst/have short cooldowns are usually your best bet against him (Diana, Talon, Akali). 

* He is a burst champion, and will usually go in for the kill if you have used your CC/ defense, or are low mana/health. It is way better to back and miss some CS than stay in lane and die to a fizz. 

* In terms of itemization vs him, it really depends on what build path he is going. Pick up some early defensive items to counter his burst. QSS and Zhonyas also work a treat in terms of negating his ult damage.

* Dodge his ult

* Bait out his troll poll (but don't use your CC in doing so). Engage on him/poke us much as you can while this is down. 

[TL;DR He doesn't need to be removed, you just have to learn how to counterplay. ](https://www.reddit.com/r/summonerschool/comments/2hrrsx/how_to_counter_fizz_properly/)
